transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji sir, IndiaMART record se baat kar rahe hain?

Executive: Haan

Customer: Ji sir, kaise hain? Abhi Ashutosh se aapka discussion hua tha na?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Ji ji, abhi sab kuch clear hai sir? Abhi kuch aur doubt toh nahi hai isme?

Customer: Are madam, aise hi chalta rahega. Mujhe kaam chahiye, kaam. Mujhe ye nahi chahiye.

Executive: Sir abhi, nahi nahi abhi kuch kuch products aapke add hue hain.

Customer: Mujhe kaam do, genuine mujhe inquiry do, kaam do mujhe. Mujhe ek aadmi toh kam se kam confirm ho jaaye lead mil gayi mujhe.

Executive: Sir dekhiye abhi jo jo cheezein aapko Ashutosh ne batai hain uss tarike se thoda sa kaam kariye. Baki product vagera bhi kuch shayad abhi add hue hain.

Customer: Madam tum toh keh rahi jab se abhi tak setting hi nahi hui kitne mahine nikal gaye mujhe paise diye the.

Executive: Ji?

Customer: Baat nahi yaar bahut maza le rahe ho tum toh.

Executive: Sorry?

Customer: Are maza le rahe ho mujhse maze.

Executive: Sir aapki services chal rahi hai IndiaMART pe uske liye call kiya hai maine.

Customer: Kya karu main aisi service ka?

Executive: Sir buyleads dekhiye buyleads pe aap baat kar rahe hain sab kuch ho raha hai sir reconvert kyun nahi ho pa rahi hai ye toh ab sochne wali baat hai. Hum toh buyleads bhej hi rahe hain aapko.

Customer: Confirm lead kahan mil rahi hai jo genuine lead hai woh toh sold out ho gayi.

Executive: Sir confirm buyers kahan milte hain ek baar bataiye zara mere ko confirm buyer kahan milte hain sir? Toh kyun force karke mujhe IndiaMART ka plan dilwaya hai. Aage se baat aisa nahi hona chahiye.

Executive: Sir hum aapko hum aapko services de rahe hain properly services chal rahi hai.

Customer: Are kya karu main aisi service ka? Hain? Kya karu main aisi service ka? Batao kya karu tum aisi service ka?

Executive: Abhi kya kya changes kiye hain Ashutosh ne ek baar aap bataiye catalog pe?

Customer: Are mujhe na pata kuch bhi.

Executive: Sir aapki meeting hui hai na abhi?

Customer: [unintelligible]

Executive: Haan ji?

Customer: Mujhe nahi pata kya kya unhone change kara kya karna pada sab tumhare hath mein hai tum unse puch lo kya kya kara unhone.

Executive: Sir update kiya hai unhone koi nahi ek kaam karte hain suniye suniye suniye ek kaam karte hain buyleads abhi jo aa rahi hai main weekly aapse phir se ek baar baat karungi. Theek hai? Aap tab tak ki buyleads purchase kariye aur yahan se hum bhi koshish kar.

Customer: Mera amount tumhare paas hai tum usme check kar lo kitna kaam aa raha hai agar tumhare paas mein kitni mehnat change karwa kar li hai kya ho gaya kya tha. Dekh lo tumhare paas mein sab kuch.

Executive: Sir main aapse wahi cheez bol rahi hun ki buyleads jo abhi aa rahi hai na usko purchase kariye ek hafte baad phir se Ashutosh ya main hum aapse connect karenge. Dekhte hain kitna improvement hua hai isme.

Customer: Do do teen teen hazar ki paanch paanch hazar 70 hazar mera kaam ho sakta hai main isme.

Executive: Sir zyada quantity ke liye filters ka use kariye na aapko tabhi toh video meeting ki hai aapne aapko batane ke liye ki sir ye aise aise use karna hai. Ab online promotion ke liye thode toh effort aapko bhi dene padenge na sir.

Customer: Pehle keh raha tha quality ke nahi aana ho jayega ho jayega.

Executive: Kya ho jayega sir use toh karenge na sir services services thodi use karna band kar denge. Bina service use kiye business thodi mil jayega sir.

Executive: Main toh abhi bhi keh rahi hun services sahi tarike se use kariye business bilkul milega.

Customer: Kaam se use na ho rahi ab.

Executive: Sir aap wahi bol rahe hain na ki aap keh rahe hain ki main utna padha likha nahi hun main utna nahi catalog dekh pata hun. Toh sir usi ke liye video meeting abhi aapse hui hai aapko sab kuch samjhaya gaya hai Ashutosh ke side se.

Customer: Unhone kuch aur meeting kari hai kuch aur samjhaya tha iske liye nahi category kaise filter lagayenge kya karenge filter ka mujhe pata hi nahi kahan pe kya lagta hai.

Executive: Haan ji?

Executive: Aap jab buyleads purchase karte hain na main aapko bata deti hun in short suniye meri baat. Jab aap buyleads purchase karte hain sabse upar aap dekhenge wahan pe filters aayenge. Filter mein aapka order value ka ek filter aayega sir woh aap 10000 ya usse upar lagaiye aur bulk lead ka filter lagaiye. Ye do filter laga lijiye sari buyleads filter hoke hi aapko dikhengi. Abhi aap sari buyleads dekh rahe hain usme se kam quantity wali bhi aa rahi hain zyada quantity wali bhi aa rahi hain. Toh bas itna sa kariye jab buyleads purchase karte hain sabse top pe.

Customer: Filter kahan aayega filter?

Executive: Haan?

Customer: Filter aala likha hua kya aala?

Executive: Filter ji ekdum upar usme tick karne ka option aayega.

Executive: Ji bulk lead ka do filter hai sun lijiye meri baat sir do filter hain ek hai bulk lead ka ek hai aapka order value ka. Order value sabse zyada number ki aap set kar lijiye sabse zyada number wali buyleads aa sake. Dusra bulk lead aayegi matlab bulk lead matlab zyada jo jisme quantity hoti hai. Ye do filter lagaiye sari buyleads aapko zyada quantity wali hi dikhengi jo aapko chahiye.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Theek hai? Itna sa kariye ye pehle karke dekhiye isme aapko kuch toh improvement dikhega hi dikhega.

Customer: Chalo theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai? Aur ek cheez aur uske baad sir main yahan Ashutosh aapse abhi kya hai aaj Monday hai na next Monday phir se ek baar baat karenge sir theek hai? Lekin dekhiye sir thoda sa aap bhi patience rakhiye. Ab dekhiye ye do cheez aapko nahi pata thi sir abhi pata chali hai inka use kariye dekhiye inse kuch benefit bilkul kuch improvement dikhega aapko isme.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Theek hai sir? Baki aapke paas number hai sir aap hum logo ko directly call kyun nahi karte hain? Aap woh bhi toh kar sakte hain sir usse aapka bhi time bachega.

Customer: Are toh aap bhi toh kar sakte ho phone.

Executive: Sir Ashutosh karte hain aapko nahi nahi Ashutosh karte hain aapko call sir. Aapka account wahi dekhte hain.

Customer: Aap kariye unhone kam se kam 10 din mein call.

Executive: Abhi sir abhi woh bhi third mein office mein nahi the third ki chuttiyon pe gaye hue the 15 din nahi available the. Toh abhi aapka tension aaya toh unhone turant aapko iske liye connect kiya hai aur uske baad phir main Monday ke liye aapki call arrange kara rahi hun Monday ko aapse ek baar phir se baat hogi sir ispe. Theek hai?

Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai sir concern abhi close kar rahi hun baki kuch bhi beech mein issue aata hai is hafte ke beech mein aap ek baar connect zarur kar lijiyega main aapse seedhe Monday baat karungi. Theek hai? Theek okay.

Customer: Theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs more genuine business leads.

- Customer is not satisfied with current services.

- Customer says he was forced to buy plan.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use filters.

- Executive will arrange a call on Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect again next Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, subscription, follow up
